channel.title: Friend Follow Bug (Again?)
channel.description: #### What happened? The first attempt follow on any friend will be failed. Reset on re-open the game. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The first attempt should be succeed. #### Steps to reproduce: Try to follow a friend #### Comments: Just please, get this of all these bugs already devs. Im so tired of watching a new bug-fix patch, yet creating even more lol. (Was joking, dont want to be too salty :3)

item.title: Friend Follow Bug (Again?)
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
What happened?

The first attempt follow on any friend will be failed. Reset on re-open the game.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The first attempt should be succeed.

Steps to reproduce:

Try to follow a friend

Comments:

Just please, get this of all these bugs already devs. Im so tired of watching a new bug-fix patch, yet creating even more lol. (Was joking, dont want to be too salty :3)

Read full topic
